home__hero: S-WORLD MULTIMEDIA A NEW GENERATION MULTIMEDIA COMPANY
home__about_us__vision__content: A special communication bridge to bring Vietnam into the world
home__about_us__mission__content: Ready to spread ideas, projects, products, and brand names in a uniquely different way, with quality - quality balance to create sustainable future
home__service__brand_communication__cont: S-World provides communication solutions for brands on multi-platform online including 4 service lines: Marketing, Press and Television communication (PR), Social Media communication, and KOL & Influencer communication
home__service__brand_communication__pr__: - S-World has deep understanding and wide relationship with media agencies. In addition, S-World is also a strategic partner with large and prestigious media enterprises in Vietnam such as VNE, VTV, etc.
- Staff are well-trained in the field of journalism
- PR Planning for brand, product, service
- Connect with Press enterprises within optimized budget
home__service__brand_communication__soci: - Knowledgeable team in terms of the mechanism of the most popular Social Network sites such as Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn
- Capable of audience analytics & Fanpage development strategy
- Organizing and managing mini games, contests, events
home__service__brand_communication__kol_: - Capable of planning within optimal investment
- Analyzing and selecting appropriate KOLs for brand, product and service
- Developing plans in accordance with the budget and target audience
home__service__brand_communication__mark: - Having thorough strategy and understanding with sales and marketing platforms
- Executing marketing campaigns on multiple platforms
home__service__branding__content: S-World provides a comprehensive solution for brands when consulting and building elements: Brand story, slogan, customer positioning and development strategy, so that businesses can come closer to customers.
home__service__branding__concept__streng: - Understanding the brand's users, especially in the 4 fields of Education, Health, Technology and International Relations
- Develop concept based on creativity and Insight distilled from End-user to ensure execution
home__service__branding__identity__stren: - Diverse ideas answering the toughest requirements
home__service__branding__identity__servi: Brand name – Slogan – Logo – Brand guidelines - Brand book
home__service__branding__strategy__stren: - Deep understanding of the market, especially the 4 fields of Education, Health, Technology and International Relations
home__service__production__content: S-World provides video production services for clients. Simultaneously, we also have the program format owned by S-World as Talkshow Nguy Co, Learn to Love, etc.
home__service__production__for_client__s: - A young, dynamic, enthusiastic and well-trained team
- An enthusiastic, creative and professional post-production team
- Video: TVC, Viral video, Documentary, Short Film Phim
- Show: Reality show, gameshow, talk show
home__service__production__format: Owned Video formats production under the trademark of S-World and Media partners - multiple platforms released
home__service__production__format__stren: - Understanding user behavior on multiple online platforms to produce engaging and meaningful program formats
- Strategic partner network with pioneering digital newspapers in Vietnam such as VNE, VTV, etc.
- Experienced program promotion team to ensure a strong widespread popularity
home__service__event__content: S-World has experience in organizing online and offline events to create opportunities for businesses to introduce products and promote brands to target audiences in an effective and impressive way, thereby achieving important goals of the business.
home__service__event__online__strength1: - Experienced in organizing big events and events for celebrities
home__service__event__online__strength4: - Experienced technical team in implementing on platforms such as Zoom Webinar, Streamyard, etc.
home__service__event__online__services1: - Ideating and detail planning for events
home__service__event__online__services4: - Preparing backup plan for technical problems
home__service__event__online__services5: - Ensuring the intelligibility of the content
home__service__event__online__services6: - Call for interaction between viewers and guests
home__service__event__offline__strength1: - Experienced in organizing events for well-knowned partners such as Do Venture, Tech Fest, etc.
home__service__event__offline__services1: - Ideating and detail planning for event
home__service__event__offline__services2: - Selecting appriate venue, time, process, etc. for event
home__service__event__offline__services3: - Preparing behind the scene and organizing the installation of event lighting and sound equipment
home__service__international_relations__: - Vietnamese company whose vision is bring products to International market or have international elements
- Global cooperation network with influential partners
- Culture understanding of international markets, especially European and Japanese markets
- Having relationship with the Crowd Funding platform such as Republic
Connecting overseas Vietnamese companies, units and individuals who want to come to Vietnam:
For foreign partner companies in Vietnam
- Having a wide relationship with media agencies, publishers, embassies
